title: Grilled salmon, braised cabbage with bacon and onions
description: Cabbage doesn't have to be boring! Try it sautéed with bacon for a healthy and tasty accompaniment to salmon.Each serving provides 536kcal, 41g protein, 11g carbohydrate (of which 10g sugars), 35g fat (of which 8g saturates), 8g fibre and 0.9g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small savoy cabbage , core removed and shredded
